data.name: rtb_MainSql.Text
data.value: SELECT EDA.EI_ID, EDA.EI_RRD_RequirementNO, DATEPART(YEAR, EDA.EI_EnterDate) AS Years, Detail.EAD_ID, Detail.EAD_RealSalary, org.AreaName, Study.PA0022_STEXT AS StudyAge, CASE WHEN emp.emp_Workday IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN DATEPART(DAY, GETDATE()) - DATEPART(DAY, emp.emp_Workday) > 0 THEN DATEDIFF(MONTH, emp.emp_Workday, GETDATE()) / 12 ELSE (DATEDIFF(MONTH, emp.emp_Workday, GETDATE()) - 1) / 12 END END AS WorkYear, Offer.EO_SalePSYearBonusPer FROM IOA..EDA_EntryInfo EDA LEFT JOIN IOA..EDA_EnterApplyDetail Detail ON Detail.EI_ID = EDA.EI_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT DicParent.D_Name, DicChild.D_ID FROM PSAData..RRA_Dictionary DicParent LEFT JOIN PSAData..RRA_Dictionary DicChild ON DicParent.D_UID = DicChild.D_ParentUID WHERE DicParent.D_Type = 'EmpGroup' AND DicParent.D_ParentUID IS NULL AND DicParent.D_Name = '正式员工' AND DicParent.D_Status = 1 ) dicEGroup ON dicEGroup.D_ID = Detail.EAD_EmployeeSubGroup LEFT JOIN PSAData..mng_DeptOrganizationRelation org ON org.HRDeptID = EDA.EI_EnterDeptID LEFT JOIN PSAData..mng_Employee emp ON emp.emp_EmployeeNo = EDA.EI_EmployeeNo OUTER APPLY ( SELECT TOP 1 PA0022_STEXT FROM IOA..SAP_HR_InfoType_PA0022 WHERE PA0022_PERNR = EDA.EI_EmployeeNo ORDER BY PA0022_ENDDA DESC ) Study OUTER APPLY ( SELECT TOP 1 EO_SalePSYearBonusPer FROM dbo.EDA_ElectronicOffer WHERE EDA_ElectronicOffer.EO_EI_ID = EDA.EI_ID ORDER BY EO_ApproveFinishedDate DESC ) Offer WHERE EDA.EI_Status IN ( -1, 2, 4 ) AND EDA.EI_Flag = 0 AND EDA.EI_EnterApproveStatus = 2 AND EDA.EI_PrepareApproveStatus = 2 AND DATEPART(YEAR, EDA.EI_EnterDate) IN ( 2019, 2020, 2021 ) AND Study.PA0022_STEXT IN ( '博士研究生', '硕士研究生', '大学本科', '大专/高职', '无证书' ) AND EAD_ID IN ('198846','198398');
